short_description:
• Butterfly and Flag/Scrim Kits
• Custom Sized Textiles available upon request
• Digital and Chroma Key Rags available in a variety of sizes
• All the Top Manufactures available
long_description: Cinelease provides it's customers with highest quality textiles in the business.  Our Grip department is renowned for having impeccably maintained overheads and flags for the Film and Television Industry.

short_description:
• Standard frame sizes available from 1" square tube to 1.5" Speed Rail
• Customized Frames available upon request
long_description: Our Grip Department houses a vast variety of overhead frames to accommodate any sized textile. The selection of frames available at Cinelease can meet the needs of the most demanding production.

short_description:
• All the top manufactures available both in Aluminum and Steel
• Every type of Baby and Junior Stands imaginable
• Specialized Motorized Stands available
long_description: Cinelease knows the importance of maintaining Grip Stands that are safe and functional.  From Overhead Sky-Hi Stands to the Mini-Baby, we can support the weight of your next production.

short_description:
• The highest quality hardware available
• Clamps, Mounts, Mafers, Vice Grip, Pipe Clamps, Stirrups, Bazookas, Wall Spreaders, and many more
long_description: Need a devise to hang that flag and/or light in an awkward place.  Cinelease provides the latest in hardware to secure your equipment anywhere.

short_description:
• A-Frames from 2 to 12 feet
• Extension Ladders available
• Safety Tested
long_description: Cinelease takes the crew's safety seriously, that's why our Grip department goes the distance to make sure that each and every ladder is safety tested before load out.

short_description:
• The largest selection of Grip Carts in the industry
• Available with pneumatic and caster wheels
• Mobility for expediting loading and unloading
long_description: From the truck to the set - Cinelease has the carts to get you there.

short_description:
• Full Sized Generators ranging from 200AMP to 1600AMP
• Portable Putt-Putt Generators available
• All crystal synced to coincide with a cameras frame rate
• Invertor, Battery packs, Battery Belts, and more….
long_description: Bring power to the set with Cinelease.  Our inventory of portable power sources gets the set up and running with simple flip of the switch.

short_description:
• Highest quality grip equipment in the industry
• Specialized and customized units available upon request
• Experienced support staff to cater to your production needs
• Top manufactures available
long_description: Cinelease has the grip equipment available to suit your productions needs.  Whether you have a small photo shoot, music video, commercial or a feature film, we carry not  only the common items but the unique items as well.  Cinelease also offers also stock and customized grip packages.
